ProjectTitle: A new strategy for chilldown enhancement in cryogenic propulsion systems
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/03/2024 [REDACTED] good DMP, some minor suggestions: [REDACTED] can leave out the GDPR, DPIA and proposal pages by unchecking these boxes under downloads. 2.1.2: [REDACTED] don't have to mention under findability that there are no specific standards for your data, mentioning the metadata that RDR adds is sufficient here, the readme file fits better under the question about provenance under reusable (2.4.4) 2.2.2: [REDACTED] can mention here that RDR is free to use for you as KU [REDACTED] researcher (up to 50GB/year) 2.2.4, 2.2.5, 2,2,8: [REDACTED] datasets cannot be shared openly and for which reason? [REDACTED] don't have to mention peer reviewed output in a DMP. [REDACTED] sure to discuss data sharing with LRD before deposit in RDR, you can also mention in the DMP that you will discuss with LRD which data you can share or whether you need to apply an embargo due to patent exploitation, https://lrd.kuleuven.be/ 2.2.10: [REDACTED] will evaluate request to access the data? (this can be your supervisor or a data access committee)
label: good with suggestions
